text: Spring of Joy () is a 1993 Swedish Danish Norwegian Finnish drama movie directed by Richard Hobert and starring Sven Lindberg, Göran Stangertz, Camilla Lundén, Helena Brodin, Gunvor Pontén, Margreth Weivers, Pierre Lindstedt. ==Other websites== * Category:1993 drama movies Category:Swedish drama movies Category:Danish drama movies Category:Norwegian drama movies Category:Finnish movies Category:Movies directed by Richard Hobert
title: Spring of Joy
